task.title: Override by deleting resets
task.shortdesc: You can override Reveal.js defaults by deleting the resets in the CSS file.

step.cmd: Find the reset classes under the "reset styles" comment
Delete the class for the element you wish to have follow normal defaults.

info.note: Be sure you know the standard CSS defaults before using this method. Also be sure this is how you want your slides to appear.
